title._content: Image taken from page 289 of 'The Story of Vermont ... Illustrations by L. J. Bridgman. (A selection of books touching upon the story of Vermont.)'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Story of Vermont ... Illustrations by L. J. Bridgman. (A selection of books touching upon the story of Vermont.)" Author: HEATON, John Langdon. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9615.ccc.2." Page: 289 Place of Publishing: Boston, Mass Date of Publishing: 1889 Publisher: D. Lothrop Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001631798 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
